Serialized Form

  • Package model

    • Class model.ToDoList extends java.util.Observable implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • color
          java.lang.String color
          Background color of the current list
        • completedTasks
          java.util.ArrayList<ToDoTask> completedTasks
          ArrayLists that holds all tasks marked as completed
        • currentSorting
          java.lang.String currentSorting
          Current sorting format used in current list
        • hideComplete
          boolean hideComplete
          Boolean determining if the completed tasks should be hidden/shown
        • name
          java.lang.String name
          Name of the current list
        • tasks
          java.util.ArrayList<ToDoTask> tasks
          ArrayList that holds all tasks of current list

    • Class model.ToDoModel extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • curList
          int curList
          Integer representing the index of the current list being used
        • lists
          java.util.ArrayList<ToDoList> lists
          ArrayList of ToDo list objects

    • Class model.ToDoTask extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • complete
          boolean complete
          Boolean representing the completion status of a task.
        • createTime
          java.util.Date createTime
          Creation date of task for the sake of sorting
        • deadline
          java.lang.String deadline
          Deadline of task (mm/dd/year).
        • description
          java.lang.String description
          Optional description of the task.
        • important
          java.lang.String important
          String signifying if the task is important or not.
        • location
          java.lang.String location
          String location given by user.
        • name
          java.lang.String name
          String name of the task.
